name: All Together (AnkanK)
description:
This game is a submission to Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 and meant for fun.  

Use WASD to move and Space to jump. 

 Killboy is chasing you and you have to run away from him without crashing with too many props. 

- Survive long. Explore glitches. Have fun.  

Developer - Ankan Karmakar 

 External music used - Coffin Dance 

 Please leave your review after playing. Each review matter for me as it is my first game. 

 Thank You!
